allow: Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch --force --tree-filter 'if [ -f workflows/credit_card_workflow.md ]; then sed -i """" ""s/gbacareza@gmail.com/[your-email]/g"" workflows/credit_card_workflow.md; fi; if [ -f workflows/household_workflow.md ]; then sed -i """" ""s/gbacareza@gmail.com/[your-email]/g"" workflows/household_workflow.md; fi' --prune-empty --tag-name-filter cat -- --all)
